level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this part.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 1004 of Fiscal Year 2010 Budget Support Second Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-207, October 15, 2009, 56 DCR 8234).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 1004 of Fiscal Year Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-260, January 4, 2010, 57 DCR 345).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-111, see notes following ยง 1-327.71.
